title: Motion-photos system does't work on my Pixel 4 xl
content:
Hey folk, 
I just have a little problem with the motion photos.
The problem is that I am just unable to use it, the permanetly deactivated and there is no way for me to enable it by pressing these buttons. I can present you a picture of my problem, but this is in German so...
I hope someone is able to solve my problem 

Sincerely yours

Sebastian
